meanings.definition: A meeting or conference held before a larger summit or event.
meanings.sent1: The presummits allowed the leaders to discuss important topics before the main summit.
meanings.sent2: The presummits are crucial for planning the logistics of the upcoming summit.
meanings.sent3: During the presummits, everyone enjoyed a delicious lunch together.
meanings.sent4: The presummits acted as stepping stones towards the final summit.
meanings.sent5: Attending the presummits helped me understand the main summit better.

meanings.definition: To hold a preliminary meeting or conference before a larger summit or event.
meanings.sent1: We need to presummits before the big summit to ensure everything goes smoothly.
